Fourth of July savings are underway this holiday weekend in the U.S. — and Apple products, along with complementary accessories, are on sale at up to $800 off.

Top 4th of July deals on Apple & more

  • 11" iPad A16 (128GB, Wi-Fi): $299 ($50 off)
  • 13" MacBook Air M4 (16GB, 256GB) in Midnight: $849 ($150 off)
  • 15" MacBook Air M4 (16GB, 256GB): $1,049 ($150 off)
  • AirTag 4-pack: $74.99 ($25 off)
  • Apple Watch Series 10 (42mm Aluminum Case, GPS): $299 ($100 off)
  • Mac mini M4 (10C CPU, 10C GPU, 16GB, 256GB): $547.92 ($45 off)
  • 14" MacBook Pro M4 (10C CPU, 10C GPU, 16GB, 512GB): $1,429 ($170 off)
  • 16" MacBook pro M4 Max (16C CPU, 40C GPU, 48GB, 1TB): $3,595.99 ($405 off)

AirTags are up to 25% off this 4th of July weekend.

Sale prices are in effect now on AirTags, with Amazon discounting the 4-pack by 25%.

AirTags

  • AirTag: $22.98 ($7 off)
  • AirTag 4-pack: $74.99 ($25 off)

AirPods & Beats up to $70 off

AirPods and Beats are up to $70 off.

Apple AirPods and Beats are on sale for the holiday, with AirPods falling to as low as $119.

AirPods

  • AirPods 4 without ANC: $119 ($10 off)
  • AirPods 4 with ANC: $148.99 ($30 off)
  • AirPods Pro 2: $199 ($50 off)
  • AirPods Max with USB-C: $479.99 ($70 off)

Beats

  • Beats Studio Pro: $299.95 ($50 off)
  • Beats Solo 4 Wireless: $129.95 ($70 off)
  • Beats Flex Wireless Earphones: $39.99 (43% off)

Get up to $400 off iPads

iPads are up to $400 off.

Today's best iPad deals start at just $299, with M4 iPad Pros up to $300 off.

  • M4 iPad Pro 11-inch (2TB, WiFi, Standard Glass): $1,699.97 ($300 off)

  • M4 iPad Pro 13-inch (256GB, Wi-Fi, Standard Glass): $1,099 ($200 off)

Blowout iPad Air deals

Apple Watches fall to as low as $169

Amazon has Apple Watch styles on sale from $169.

Amazon's Apple Watch deals have prices dipping to as low as $169, with the Series 10 on sale from $299.

Apple Watch

  • 40mm Apple Watch SE 2 GPS (Aluminum Case, select colors): $169 ($80 off)

Docks, monitors & accessories

Get a free gift card with Samsung monitor preorders - Image credit: Samsung

A multitude of docking stations, displays, and accessories are marked down for 4th of July and heading into Prime Day. Even Samsung's new M9 monitor is eligible for a free Amazon gift card through a preorder incentive.

  • Ugreen Thunderbolt 4 Dock Revodok Max 213 13-in-1 Dock: $239.98 ($60 off)
  • Samsung 32-inch Smart Monitor M8 (M80F): $699.99 (Free $100 Amazon gift card)
  • Samsung 32-inch OLED M9 (M90SF) Smart Monitor: $1,599.99 (Free $300 Amazon gift card)

With Prime Day 2025 just four days away, it's worth having a look at our Apple Price Guides for deals on every configuration that are already in effect.

Many Apple resellers like B&H are competing with Amazon by offering steep discounts on retail and upgraded CTO configurations, the latter which aren't available at the big box retailers.
